title: Rihanna: Bitch Betta Have Her Money (and Stop Suing Her)
description:
Rihanna is an award winning musician and one of the most successful entrepreneurs in the world with an estimated net worth of $1.7 billion. But, with great success comes a few hiccups. Tune in to hear about her billion dollar empire and the legal hurdles she faced along the way.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/legallyjudgy
LinkTree: https://linktr.ee/legallyjudgy
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
